articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to Egyptian President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi in connection with the fact that 21 Egyptians, who had been recently abducted in Libya, were mercilessly killed by terrorists.
					 The message extended sympathy and consolation to the president, government and people of Egypt and the bereaved families of the victims.
					
					 The DPRK government strongly denounces terrorism against Egyptians in Libya from its consistent stand of opposing all forms of terrorism and any support to it, the message said. 
					
					 It reiterated the invariable support and solidarity of the DPRK with the efforts of the Egyptian government and people to protect security and stability of the country and national unity.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Sends Message of Sympathy to Egyptian FM
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Sends Message of Sympathy to Egyptian FM
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of sympathy to his Egyptian counterpart Sameh Shoukry in connection with the fact that 21 Egyptians, who had been recently abducted in Libya, were mercilessly killed by terrorists. 
					 The message expressed deep sympathy to the bereaved families of the victims and extended full support and solidarity to the efforts of the Egyptian Foreign Ministry to protect security and stability of the country and realize durable peace in the Middle East.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Lao Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong had a talk with Lao Ambassador to the DPRK Kiettisak Keobanhdith who paid a farewell call on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: National Peace Committee Slams Chemical Warfare Committed by US
articles.content:
National Peace Committee Slams Chemical Warfare Committed by US
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The National Peace Committee of Korea issued an indictment Tuesday denouncing the U.S. for committing indelible crimes against the Korean nation and condemning the south Korean puppet forces for defending their master, the U.S., and insulting the fellow countrymen.
					 The Hague declaration banning the use of toxic gas, the Geneva protocol banning the use in war of asphyxiating, toxic and other gases and method of germ warfare, treaty and rules on ground war and usage and other international law and war norms shall ban the use of germ weapons and poisonous chemical weapons and other weapons of mass destruction, define their users as hideous criminals and hold them to account under the criminal law, the indictment said, and went on:
					
					 During the Korean war the U.S. mobilized germ weapons and poisonous chemical weapons and committed unprecedented massacres in wanton violation of international law and norms.
					
					 While working out a plan for a war against the DPRK, the U.S. pushed forward the preparations for germ warfare in strict confidence.
					
					 After the Japanese imperialists' defeat in the Second World War, the U.S. buckled down to collecting research data of unit 731 of the Imperial Japanese Army and in 1947 it concluded a secret agreement on not taking war criminal Shiro Ishii, commander of the unit, and other murderers to the Tokyo war criminal court in return for taking over experts in germ and chemical warfare of the unit and results of experiments of germ weapons on living bodies conducted by the unit.
					
					 According to this, the U.S. took over from Japan data on more than 8,000 experiments of germ and toxic gases on more than 3.6 million living bodies, various reference data, photos, film slides, drawing of germ shells, and germ research institutes and facilities in Japan.
					
					 At the instructions of MacArthur, the then commander of the U.S. forces in the Far East, Shiro Ishii and other war criminals of the unit were involved in the research of germ weapons carried out by the U.S. forces.
					
					 The data of the unit were transferred to a unit of the U.S. forces known as a center for the study of biological weapons at that time and U.S. scientists worked out more than 20 kinds of study reports based on it.
					
					 Based on the data presented by Japanese experts on germ warfare and its own researches, the U.S. carried out several experiments of germ weapons spreading cholera and Japanese encephalitis among south Koreans in 1946 and 1949.
					
					 The U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff drafted an emergency operational plan for germ warfare based on it and put the plan into practice against the Korean people during the Korean war, the indictment said, citing facts.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces who had put the northern half of Korea under their temporary occupation during the June 25 war were beaten back by the Korean People's Army and took to flight when they spread in a crafty manner a number of contagious disease germs including smallpox in many areas including Pyongyang, Yangdok County of South Phyongan Province and Kowon and Jangjin counties of South Hamgyong Province between November 29 to December 8, 1950.
					
					 A top secret document dated September 21, 1951 which ordered the "large experiment of specified pathogens in actual situation to see their effects for germ warfare in operational situation" was discovered at the U.S. national archives in 2010.
					
					 In November 1951 the U.S. imperialists dropped the first germ bomb in the areas north of the River Chongchon and south of the River Amnok and in Yangdok, Hamhung and Wonsan with the involvement of the U.S. third bomber wing in the Kunsan air base and the 19th bomber wing under the command of the U.S. air force in the Far East based on Okinawa.
					
					 Entering 1952 they began an all-out germ warfare, massively dropping germ bombs in all areas of the northern half of Korea.
					
					 They made no scruple of using even internationally banned chemical weapons, to say nothing of germ weapons.
					
					 During the indiscriminate bombing of Nampho City on May 6, 1951, the U.S. spread toxic gas, killing 1,379 inhabitants. On July 6 and September 1 it dropped tear, asphyxiating and other toxic gases in the area of Wonsan and several areas of South and North Hwanghae provinces, poisoning and killing many people.
					
					 They even made no scruple of mixing poisonous substances in sweets, biscuits, taffy, toasts, canned food, shellfish and other foodstuff and bank notes before dropping them from planes.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists used prisoners from our side as guinea pigs for germ and chemical warfare in wanton violation of international agreement on treatment of POWs and killed them in a barbarous way.
					
					 Revealing that the U.S. resorted to bio-chemical war even after the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement, the indictment continued:
					
					 The U.S. introduced to south Korea a detachment of the U.S. micro-biological research institute under unit 406 of the germ weapons institute of the U.S. army stationed in Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan in 1976 and set up germ research institutes at Korea University, Kyunghee University, etc. where they carried out the experiment of epidemic hemorrhagic fever, malignant infectious disease of high fatality, thus verifying the effect of its spread.
					
					 The U.S. man-killers even used the internal organs of living persons and even embryos for the experiment of germ weapons.
					
					 It viciously carried out the preparations for chemical warfare targeting the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. which had openly cried out for "continued modernization of poisonous materials for battles, one of fundamental elements of the U.S. military potentials" has massively introduced into south Korea and stockpiled there a huge amount of chemical weapons and toxic chemical materials including binary chemical weapons whose use is banned internationally.
					
					 The puppet forces of south Korea who witnessed the efficiency of bio-chemical weapons when the U.S. used them in the Vietnamese war, began to develop bio-chemical weapons in June 1981.
					
					 They have pushed ahead with the joint development of germ and chemical weapons with research institutes under the U.S. Defense Department and the U.S. Army while reinforcing the think-tank of their own germ weapons research institute.
					
					 They also egged not only munitions enterprises but also civilian enterprises on to massively develop and produce bio-chemical weapons with the approval of the U.S. master on possession of independent bio-chemical warfare capabilities.
					
					 The puppet forces also let germ weapons research institute massively breed various insects, ticks and rodents for the experiment on living bodies of germs and viruses and made several universities including Korea University and Kyunghee University to set up germ research institutes in collaboration with the U.S. and develop new pathogens of high contagiousness.
					
					 These facts are just a tip of iceberg of bio-chemical warfare committed by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces on the Korean peninsula during the Korean war and the postwar period.
					
					 The international organizations including the UN and the world people should take the U.S. to the international war criminal tribunal for such hideous crimes as taking lives of a number of Koreans through murderous germ and chemical warfare and polluting the land of Korea, sternly punish war criminals under international law and force them to pay a thousand-fold price for the huge damage they caused to the Koreans.
					
					 The puppet forces can not evade punishment as they are accomplices with the U.S. in its germ and chemical warfare. They should apologize before the nation and face stern punishment for defending and conniving at the U.S. germ warfare that had already been disclosed before the world and committing such thrice-cursed crimes as rubbing salt on the wounds of a great number of victims and their bereaved families.

articles.title: Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Cuban Ambassador
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez hosted a reception at his embassy on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Invited to the reception were Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The Cuban ambassador said in a speech:
					
					 The Cuban people will always remember the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by boosting the friendly relations between the two parties, governments and peoples provided by Comrade Kim Il Sung together with Comrade Fidel Castro.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is being reliably carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 We look with admiration at the achievements made by the DPRK.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju noted that Kim Jong Il led to victory the struggle of the servicepersons and people to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country with his gifted ideological and theoretical activities and tireless Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Korean people will as ever make every possible effort to boost the traditional friendship and cooperation with the Cuban people true to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We will send positive support and solidarity to the just struggle of the fraternal Cuban people to defend the socialist gains.

articles.title: Symposium Discloses Injustice of Japan's Territorial Claim to Tok Islets
articles.content:
Symposium Discloses Injustice of Japan's Territorial Claim to Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A symposium of social scientists to disclose injustice of Japan's claim to "Tok Islets" and denounce its militarist moves for expanding territory took place at the Academy of Social Sciences Wednesday.
					 The symposium heard papers that proved with scientific and detailed facts that Tok Islets are part of inviolable territory of Korea and denounced Japan's historical moves to grab Tok Islets.
					
					 Associate academician, Prof. and Dr. Jo Hui Sung, director of an institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, said that Tok Islets have been part of the inalienable territory of Korea throughout history.
					
					 The fact that Ullung Island was discovered and explored in the ancient times (or before) indicates the possibility of the discovery and exploration of the islets.
					
					 Usan Kingdom which had Ullung Island and Tok Islets under its administration with Ullung Island as main territory were returned to Silla Kingdom early in the 6th century and later they were put under the administration of Uljin County of Koryo after its fall.
					
					 During the Korean feudal dynasty Ullung Island and Tok Islets remained land belonging to Uljin County, Kangwon Province.
					
					 The feudal dynasty promulgated ordinance No. 41 on October 25, 1900 to reconfirm its dominium over Tok Islets under modern international law at that time. It went through legal procedures concerning territorial possession and declared it at home and abroad. It was five years before the Japanese imperialists fabricated "Shimane Prefectural Proclamation" No. 40.
					
					  Dr. and Associate Prof. Ri Kwang Hui, deputy dean of a faculty of Kim Il Sung University, noted:
					
					 Japan has historically committed the moves to grab Ullung Island and Tok Islets.
					
					 Japan's moves to invade Tok Islets had persisted till its occupation of Korea, beginning with its invasion of Ullung Island in the latter half of the 14th century.
					
					 During the Imjin Patriotic War the Japanese troops intruded into the island, turning it into debris and in the 17th century they plundered Ullung Island and Tok Islets of their vast area of forest and marine resources.
					
					 Japan hatched a new plot to hold the dominium over Ullung Island and Tok Islets while officially recognizing the Korean feudal dynasty's dominium over those territories.
					
					 In December 1869 right after the "Meiji Restoration", Japan sent high-ranking officials of the Foreign Ministry to Korea to learn about the historical background against which Ullung Island and Tok Islets came under the jurisdiction of Korea. In 1882 when sending Hanabusa as a representative having full mandate after soldiers' uprising in Korea, Japan gave him a secret instruction to take over Ullung Island from the Korean feudal dynasty.
					
					 Dr. and Associate Prof. Han Yong Chan, deputy rector of Kim Chol Ju University of Education, said:
					
					 Japan's "dominium over Tok Islets" is a shameless distortion of history full of deception, conspiracy and crafty trick, when viewed from "Shimane Prefectural Proclamation".
					
					 The "Shimane Prefectural Proclamation" is proven to be illegal and false document through international conventions on postwar handling of Japanese territory as they defined Tok Islets as land to be abandoned by Japan and made them land of Korea.
					
					 The Cairo Declaration and the Potsdam Declaration also made it clear that areas Japan grabbed by violence out of greed are excluded from Japan's territory and clearly defined four main islands and "several small islets" to be decided by allies in the future as Japan's territory. 
					
					 Dr. and Associate Prof. Hwang Myong Chol, room chief of the Academy of Social Sciences, said:
					
					 Japan's dominium over "Tok Islets" is a revelation of its militarist ambition for territorial expansion.
					
					 An immediate aim sought by Japan through its territorial claim to Tok Islets is to seize rich natural resources in the waters off Tok Islets, hold a monopoly of economic interests there and thus provide an outpost and a military bridgehead from which to realize its territorial ambition and attempt at reinvasion.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries consider the DPRK as the primary target of their overseas aggression and dream of advancing into the continent with Korea as a springboard in a bid to dominate Asia once again.
					
					 The speakers demanded the Japanese reactionaries retract at once the shameless "claim to Tok Islets" and "Day of Takeshima" and stop their rash actions prompted by an anachronistic daydream.

articles.title: Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
articles.content:
Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the venue of the 19th Kimjongilia Festival on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They went round the venue filled with famous flowers in full bloom for the great man.
					
					 Jo Il Min said that it is the festival of immortal flowers full of boundless reverence and yearning for the peerlessly great man.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 There are many flowers in the world but it is hard to see such famous flower as Kimjongilia reflective of sincerity of all people.
					
					 This flower is, indeed, the most beautiful and wonderful flower in the world which reminds the people of the personality of General Kim Jong Il as a great man.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and other patriotic people will hold respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as the lodestar of national reunification in high esteem and dynamically advance to bring earlier the day of reunification when Kimjongilia will bloom all over the land of Korea.

articles.title: Service Personnel, People Visit Kim Jong Il's Works Exhibition House
articles.content:
Service Personnel, People Visit Kim Jong Il's Works Exhibition House
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visit the Kim Jong Il's Works Exhibition House every day on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary) and February 19, the anniversary of his proclamation of the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 The exhibition house shows the immortal feats of leader Kim Jong Il who provided the most correct guidelines of the Songun revolution with his original ideological and theoretical activities. 
					
					 Displayed there are photos of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. On display are also more than 1,100 works of Kim Jong Il and his propositions and manuscripts of his works according to the contents of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Looking round the works, manuscripts and other historic documents in which he formulated the original arms philosophy and the principle of Songun and established the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism, the visitors deeply grasp the personality of the peerlessly great man who was possessed of distinguished ideological and theoretical wisdom.

articles.title: Customs on Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Customs on Lunar New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- From olden times, the Korean people have enjoyed the Lunar New Year's Day.
					 They have paid deep attention to making preparations for the Lunar New Year's Day.
					
					 Housewives make new clothes for family members, clean rooms and prepare special dishes on the eve of the Lunar New Year's Day.
					
					 On the day, New Year greetings have been exchanged among family members. It is also considered very important that juniors should make a New Year's call to seniors and teachers.
					
					 Holiday dishes include rice-cake soup, glutinous rice-cake, sweets, fruit punch, steak, liquor, etc.
					
					 The Korean people have also enjoyed the Lunar New Year's Day, playing yut game and seesaw and playing kite-flying and sleigh-riding.
					
					 The Lunar New Year's Day falls on February 19.

articles.title: High-Quality Power Cables in Great Demand
articles.content:
High-Quality Power Cables in Great Demand
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Power cables of different sizes, produced by the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326 in the DPRK, have been enjoying an increased demand at home and abroad.
					 Among those cables are high-tension paper and high-tension plastic cables.
					
					 The high-tension paper cable is accredited to the international standard IEC60055-1:1981.
					
					 The factory has steadily pushed forward its modernization, while improving the quality inspection of its products.
					
					 The two kinds of cables were awarded the Dec. 15 medal for quality which is conferred only to the best domestic products.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean FM's Reckless Remarks against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean FM's Reckless Remarks against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, south Korean foreign minister, when meeting with the U.S. secretary of State recently, talked rubbish that the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK is a "main factor of uneasiness" and "it is necessary to press for denuclearization process", echoing the U.S utterance about "nuclear threat from the north". Yun was closeted with the latter over cooperation and joint efforts to cope with "nuclear issue of the north."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 One cannot but be shocked at the fact that such a fool running riot, unaware of the real "factor of uneasiness" on the Korean peninsula, is leading the south Korean Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 The U.S. moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK are the main factor of making the situation on the Korean peninsula unstable and escalating tension there.
					
					 The U.S. worked out a dangerous war scenario calling for "prompt use of nukes" against the DPRK and staged ill-famed joint military drills every year, systematically escalating the military threat and blackmail against the latter. It is hard reality that due to the nuclear war moves of the U.S., the Korean nation has suffered constant uneasiness and pain, and the stability and peace on the peninsula have been seriously disturbed.
					
					 This notwithstanding, Yun termed the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defence a "main factor of uneasiness" while shelving the U.S. brigandish nuclear threat and blackmail. One cannot but be skeptical about whether he has normal thinking power or not.
					
					 What traitor Yun uttered this time is a clear indication of the south Korean puppet group's inveterate pro-U.S. consciousness and wild ambition for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The reality again clearly proves that the puppet group hasn't got even an iota of concern for north-south dialogue and mending of north-south relations but only pursues a wild ambition to do harm to compatriots with the backing of outsiders.

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Service Deplores Miserable Society
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Service Deplores Miserable Society
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- CBS of south Korea on Feb. 13 deplored the stunning reality of south Korea in which an overwhelming majority of the poor have to live like slaves generation after generation.
					 A professor at the Anglican Church University recently released a paper titled "Study of job move of part-timers", a scientific proof that the employment form is handed over to children, the radio noted, and went on:
					
					 According to the paper, 70 percent of children of full-timers and part-timers become part-timers and if parents are part-timers, their children are highly likely to be part-timers.
					
					 One may think it is the times when 99 percent hired by upper-class which accounts for one percent of the population live like slaves.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Demands Regime Reveal Truth of Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Demands Regime Reveal Truth of Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Kyunghyang Daily News in an editorial on Feb. 11 demanded the puppet authorities disclose the truth of the ferry Sewol disaster at an early date.
					 The editorial mentioned that the Kwangju District Court sentenced the former captain of guard ship 123 of the Mokpho Maritime Police Station to four years in prison for not taking positive steps to rescue the passengers aboard the ferry.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The bereaved families, however, reacted angrily, protesting the sentence is too light.
					
					 The investigation of the prosecution ended in just calling to task the captain and sailors of the guard ship, some staff members of the Chonghaejin shipping company and junior officers of the maritime police. 
					
					 Charging that the "government" and the "Saenuri Party" are interrupting the activities of the special investigation committee, the editorial demanded the authorities buckle down to the refloatation of the ferry.

articles.title: Koreans in US Praise Kim Jong Il as Great Politician
articles.content:
Koreans in US Praise Kim Jong Il as Great Politician
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a meeting in the U.S. on Feb. 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. They highly praised the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who dedicated his all to the country and the nation.
					 They lauded Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il as the great thinker, politician and brilliant commander who built the DPRK into an invincible political, ideological and military power by embodying the Juche idea.
					
					 He made high-intensity forced march for field guidance while going in simple jumper all his life, they said, adding:
					
					 He provided two north-south summits in 2000 and 2007, presenting the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to the Koreans. Those exciting days are unforgettable.
					
					 They called for turning out in the nation-wide movement to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification this year, while always remembering his revolutionary career.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans' Paper Terms Obama Failed President
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans' Paper Terms Obama Failed President
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Minjok Sibo, an overseas Koreans' paper published in Japan, on Feb. 6 carried an article titled "Failure of President Obama".
					 The article said Obama will leave his name as the failed president.
					
					 His failure revealed more apparently in his policy toward the DPRK, it said, and went on:
					
					 He has no policy to realize peace on the Korean peninsula from the day when he took office.
					
					 In the first half of his tenure he sought to occupy the north under the pretext of the Cheonan warship sinking case. In the middle of his tenure he was at a loss what to do before the north's independent line.
					
					 The "human rights issue" was the idea which came to his mind to bring down the north at present.
					
					 Obama should realize that the issue of the Korean peninsula can be settled only when the sovereignty of the north is respected and the issue settled through dialogue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Maritime Territory of Russia held a meeting at the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka on Feb. 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event was a photo of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					
					 On display there were works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books on undying revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos showing the appearance of the DPRK.
					
					 Present at the event were the vice-chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of Russia, and officials of Koreans bodies and Koreans in other regions and the consul general and consuls.
					
					 The participants placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the full-length painting of the President standing on Mt. Paektu together with Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the event speakers said Kim Jong Il defended socialist Korea and glorify it under the uplifted banner of Songun and laid an eternal foundation for the prosperity of Korea.
					
					 He was deeply respected by the world's progressives for his great contribution to boosting the DPRK-Russia friendship and ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia, they said. 
					
					 They expressed belief that Korea was sure to be reunified thanks to Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- Thongil, monthly socio-political magazine of the International United Confederation of Koreans, carried a special write-up on Feb. 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 February 16 marks the 73rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, leader of the DPRK, the magazine said.
					
					 It noted he dedicated himself to the country and its people all his life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Mexico
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its bulletin carried the main contents of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" on February 9. 
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that in order to successfully accomplish the socialist cause it is necessary to make the ideological work a key priority with a firm hold on it. It also says that the basic task of the ideological work is to imbue the whole society with the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted on the basis of the principle and method suited to the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Opens in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- The Kimjongilia exhibition opened in Ulan Bator, Mongolia on February 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the event were personages from all social strata and other people in Mongolia.
					
					 The general secretary of the National Democratic Party of Mongolia said:
					
					 Kimjongilia in full bloom despite severe cold clearly shows the ardent reverence of the Mongolian people for HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This flower which goes by the august name of Kim Jong Il will always remain in full bloom in Mongolia.
					
					 The rector of the Mongolian Politics and Business School said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il defended the sovereignty of the country and the nation by pursuing the Songun politics.
					
					 He wisely led socialist Korea to victory after victory by foiling the pressure and interference of the imperialists by dint of the independent politics, the Songun politics.
					
					 Only victory and glory will be in store for the Korean people advancing, united close around supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kimjongilia exhibtions took place in Dalian and Shenyang of China on February 10 and 13.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in UK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in UK
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting, photo and book exhibition and film show took place in London on February 9 under the sponsorship of the British preparatory committee for celebrating the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were photos showing his revolutionary career and exploits.
					
					 Exhibited there were books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants watched the Korean film documenting successes achieved by the Korean people in the socialist construction.
					
					 Present at the event were personages and members of the communist parties, Juche idea study bodies and bodies for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in the capital city and local areas.
					
					 Michael Chant, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (MarxistÔºçLeninist), said in his speech:
					
					 Not only the Korean people but also world revolutionaries struggling against exploitation and oppression and world peace-loving people always cherish the august name of Kim Jong Il in their minds.
					
					 It is because Kim Jong Il set a great example to be followed by all revolutionaries while leading the Korean revolution in the latter half of the 20th century and early in the 21st century crowded with stirring events.
					
					 Revolutionaries of the UK should profoundly study the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed for developing the party, state and armed forces of the DPRK and accomplishing the socialist cause of the world.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored famous works such as "Socialism Is a Science" late in the past century when the socialist cause was undergoing a temporary trial, instilling stronger conviction of victory and enthusiasm of struggle into the world revolutionaries.
					
					 As he led the DPRK, it could courageously meet all challenges of history.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mongolia
articles.content:
Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea took place at the University for Study of International Affairs of Mongolia on February 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 On display at the venue of the seminar were photos showing his revolutionary career and exploits. Also displayed there were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK working hard to build a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 Present at the seminar were personages of the Mongolian Democratic Party, Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, Mongolian Peace and Friendship Organization, Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies, Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun, Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, Mongolia-Democratic Korea Friendship Bridge Association, J. Sambuu Herders Development Fund of Mongolia, University for Study of International Affairs and other people. 
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and paid high tribute to him. 
					
					 Chuluunbaatar, deputy director of the Mongolian Institute for Strategic Studies said in his speech that the grand national seminar on the Juche idea held in Ulan Bator on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il fully shows the boundless reverence of the Mongolian people for him. 
					
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said the struggle of the Korean people for achieving the prosperity and development of the country by their own efforts encourages the Mongolian people. 
					
					 Ch. Bayarbat, executive chairman of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche, the member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for making an undying contribution to the human cause of independence by developing in depth the immortal Juche idea fathered by Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Peru
 Pyongyang, February 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Lima on February 11 under the sponsorship of the Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating his 73rd birth anniversary. 
					 Present at the meeting were personages of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union, Peruvian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Kim Jong Suk Library of Peru, Peruvian People's Women Union, Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship and other people. 
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) said Kim Jong Il adhered to the socialist principle by bravely weathering manifold difficulties and ordeals caused by the imperialists' anti-socialist moves and the collapse of socialism in East European countries with his revolutionary will and resolution. He firmly defended Korean socialism and made the Korean people strong in the spirit of socialism and patriotism, the chairman added. 
					
					 The chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru said that the DPRK has become a socialist country, an invincible power and model of independence making uninterrupted revolution and steady advance under the leadership of Kim Jong Il despite the moves of the imperialists for aggression. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 All the victories of the DPRK are ascribable to the great leaders. 
					
					 Today the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people are working hard to build a thriving nation and achieve national reunification, desires of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand the strength of the DPRK and behave itself, replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace one and withdraw its troops from south Korea. 
					
					 The DPRK will surely achieve the final victory in the struggle against the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: CNCDP acusan a titeres surcoreanos de amparar atrocidades de EE.UU.
articles.content:
CNCDP acusan a titeres surcoreanos de amparar atrocidades de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz hizo publica la vispera el acta de acusacion  denunciando la repugnancia de los compinches titeres surcoreanos que calumnian a su connacional defendiendo la bestialidad de su amo gringo que cometio los crimenes antieticos imperdonables ante la nacion coreana.
					El acta senala que las leyes internacionales y las normas de guerra, inclusive la declaracion  de la Haya sobre la prohibicion de uso de gases toxicos, estipulan prohibir el empleo de armas de extermino masivo tales como armas biologicas y otros quimicos venenosos, determinar a sus usuarios como graves criminales y sentenciarles la responsabilidad penal, y prosigue:
					
					Sin embargo, el pais norteamericano echo una vista gorda a todas leyes y normas internacionales durante la pasada guerra coreana y asesino masivamente a las personas  lanzando hasta las armas bacteriologicas y otras  quimicas venenosas.
					
					Al trazar el plano de provocacion de guerra contra la RPDC, el imperio promovio en secreto los preparativos para la guerra bacteriologica.
					
					Cuando el imperialismo japones fue derrotado en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el imperio yanqui se entrego a recoger los datos de investigacion de la unidad 731 del infame ejercito japones y concerto en 1947 un acuerdo  extraoficial de no entregar al jefe de esa unidad Shiro Ishii y otros verdugos al tribunal de criminales de guerra en Tokio a precio de recibir a los especialistas y los datos de ensayo hecho con el cuerpo humano vivo de esa unidad japonesa.
					
					Asi, EE.UU. recibio de la parte japonesa mas de 8 mil datos de ensayo de bacteria y gas toxico cometido contra mas de 3 millones 600 mil personas y otros de referencia, las fotos, el diseno de bombas bacteriologicas, los institutos e instalaciones de investigacion de bacterias en Japon, etc.
					
					Segun la orden de MacArthur, comandante de tropas yanquis en el Extremo Oriente, Shiro Ishii y otros criminales de la unidad 731 se sumaron a la investigacion de armas biologicas de tropas norteamericanas.
					
					Los datos de la unidad 731 del ejercito japones se trasladaron a una unidad norteamericana reconocida como centro de investigacion de armas biologicas de Estados Unidos de aquel entonces, y los cientificos norteamericanos elaboraron mas de 20 informes de estudio a base de ellos.
					
					A base de los datos de especialistas japoneses y el estudio propio, EE.UU. perpetro en varias ocasiones en los anos 1946 y 1949 el experimento de armas biologicas que propagan la colera y encefalitis japones contra la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					A base de ello, la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU. elaboro el plan de operacion emergente para la guerra bacteriologica y lo llevo a la practica durante la pasada guerra coreana contra los habitantes coreanos.
					
					Retirandose por la ofensiva del Ejercito Popular de Corea, las tropas agresoras yanquis que habian ocupado temporalmente la parte norte de la RPDC propagaron del 29 de noviembre al 8 de diciembre del 1950 con las maneras astutas muchos germenes patogenos como la viruela en Pyongyang, el distrito de Yangdok de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, los distritos de Kowon y Jangjin de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y otras regiones.
					
					Quedo descubierto en 2010 en el archivo nacional de EE.UU. un documento secreto de categoria A, segun lo cual la Junta de Jefes de Estado Mayor de EE.UU. ordeno el 21 de septiembre de 1951 "realizar en gran envergadura el experimento real para conocer  el efecto de los germenes patogenos especificos  para la guerra biologica en la situacion operacional".
					
					El imperio yanqui lanzo primeras bombas biologicas en la zona norte del rio Chongchon y la zona sur del rio Amnok, asi como en Yangdok, Hamhung y Wonsan movilizando sus fuerzas aereas estacionadas en los suelos surcoreano y japones.
					
					En 1952, los agresores yanquis lanzaron en gran escala las bombas bacteriologicas en todas las regiones de la parte norte de la RPDC.
					
					Los yanquis utilizaron no solo las armas biologicas sino las quimicas prohibidas por la ley internacional.
					
					Al salpicar en gran escala el 6 de mayo de 1951 los gases toxicos sobre la ciudad de Nampho asesinaron a 1 379 personas inocentes. Lanzaron el 6 de julio y el dia primero de septiembre las bombas lacrimogenas y las de gases asfixiantes en la zona de Wonsan y  otras regiones de las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur y del Norte causando asi muchos toxicomanos y muertos.
					
					No vacilaron en mezclar las sustancias venenosas en los caramelos, galletas y otros alimentos y el dinero.
					
					Violando abiertamente el tratado internacional sobre el trato de prisioneros de guerra, asesinaron bestialmente a los prisioneros coreanos tomandolos como objeto de experimento de las guerras biologicas y quimicas.
					
					Despues de firmado el Acuerdo de Armisticio, EE.UU. recurrio sin parar a las maniobras de guerra bioquimica.
					
					En 1976, EE.UU. envio al suelo surcoreano un destacamento de avanzada adscrito a la unidad 406 del Instituto de Armas Biologicas de las fuerzas terrestres norteamericanas, enclavada en el departamento de Kanagawa de Japon.
					
					El destacamento instalo los institutos de bacterias en la Universidad Koryo y la Kyunghee donde se llevaron a cabo las pruebas de armas bacteriologicas hemorragicas con los habitantes y estudiantes surcoreanos. 
					
					Los yanquis utilizaron hasta las visceras y fetos en las pruebas de armas biologicas. 
					
					Ademas, prepararon la guerra quimica contra la RPDC. 
					
					Ya desde hace mucho tiempo, expusieron abiertamente la decision de "modernizar de continuo las armas de sustancias nocivas para el combate" considerandolas como uno de los elementos principales de las potencialidades militares norteamericanas". Para ese fin, emplazaron en el Sur de Corea enorme cantidad de armas y sustancias quimicas cuyo uso esta prohibido en virtud de la ley internacional. 
					
					Al mismo tiempo, realizaron las pruebas de estas armas mortiferas con los habitantes de ambas partes de Corea.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos fueron complices de la guerra bioquimica de EE.UU. 
					
					Desde que vieron la eficiencia de armas bioquimicas usadas por EE.UU. en la guerra vietnamita, los titeres surcoreanos se enfrascaron en junio de 1981 en el desarrollo de las mismas. 
					
					Reforzaron los cerebros del instituto de armas bacteriologicas y al mismo tiempo, impulsaron el desarrollo conjunto de armas bacteriologicas y quimicas con los institutos del Departamento de Defensa norteamericano. 
					
					Con el permiso del amo norteamericano sobre la posesion de la capacidad independiente de guerra bioquimica, instigaron a los consorcios militares y civiles al desarrollo y produccion de armas bioquimicas.
					
					Hicieron criar en el instituto de armas bacteriologicas los insectos, garrapatas y roedores e instalar en la Universidad Koryo, la Kyunghee y otras los organos de investigacion bacteriologica en colaboracion con EE.UU. para estudiar y desarrollar nuevos agentes patogenos. 
					
					Tales datos no pasan de ser una parte de las atrocidades bioquimicas cometidas por EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos en el periodo de la pasada guerra coreana y en el tiempo posbelico en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					La ONU y otras organizaciones internacionales y toda la humanidad deben sentenciar en virtud de la ley internacional a EE.UU. y otros criminales de guerra que mataron a incontables coreanos y contagiaron el territorio coreano y cobrar el precio de enormes perdidas causadas al pueblo coreano.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos tampoco pueden eludir el castigo.
					
					Ellos deben pedir disculpas y ser condenados por haber amparado las atrocidades bacteriologicas de EE.UU. y ofendido a las victimas y sus familiares.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el 16 de febrero
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por el 16 de febrero
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el embajador cubano en Corea, German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, ofrecio el dia 18 un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					Fueron invitados Kang Sok Ju, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Suk, presidenta del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Pak Kun Gwang, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, el vicecanciller Sin Hong Chol y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					Estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada cubana en Corea.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					German Hermin Ferras Alvarez dijo que el pueblo cubano nunca olvidara las proezas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien fortalecio mas las relaciones de amistad entre los partidos, gobiernos y pueblos de ambos paises que prepararon juntos el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el companero Fidel Castro.
					
					Prosiguio que la causa revolucionaria, iniciada por los Generalisimos, la continua firmemente el Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien dirige la revolucion coreana.
					
					Apunto que ellos estan viendo con admiracion la realidad de Corea.
					
					Kang Sok Ju senalo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio a la victoria la lucha del ejercito y pueblo coreanos por construir un Estado prospero socialista y reunificar la patria, mediante sus geniales actividades ideologicas y teoricas e incansable direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun. 
					
					En el futuro tambien, el pueblo coreano hara todo lo posible por desarrollar las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con el pueblo cubano, en acato al noble espiritu de los Generalisimos, dijo.
					
					Concluyo que apoyaran activamente la justa lucha del hermano pueblo cubano por defender las conquistas del socialismo.

articles.title: Tiene lugar seminario de ciencias sociales sobre islote Tok
articles.content:
Tiene lugar seminario de ciencias sociales sobre islote Tok
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en la Academia de Ciencias Sociales el seminario del sector de ciencias sociales sobre el islote Tok.
					En la ocasion se publicaron las tesis que argumentan con datos cientificos y concretos que el islote Tok forma parte del territorio coreano desde la antiguedad.
					
					Las tesis revelan y condenan tambien las acciones expansionistas que cometieron  historicamente los reaccionarios japoneses.
					
					El director de instituto de la academia, candidato al academico, profesor titular y Dr. Jo Hui Sung, comprobo que el islote Tok es historicamente una parte de la tierra coreana.
					
					La isla Ullung fue descubierta y explorada en la epoca antigua (o mas antes) y este hecho insinua la posibilidad de descubrimiento y exploracion del Tok, islote cercano a la primera, dijo el y prosiguio:
					
					El Reino Usan, que tenia la isla Ullung como territorio principal y dominaba hasta el Tok, se anexo a Silla a principios del siglo VI y posteriormente, se incorporo a la administracion de Uljin de Coryo.
					
					Aun en la dinastia feudal de Joson, esos islotes formaban parte de la mencionada administracion de la provincia de Kangwon.
					
					A fin de reafirmar su soberania sobre el islote Tok en virtud de la ley internacional de la epoca contemporanea, aquella dinastia hizo publica el 25 de octubre de 1900 la orden imperial No. 41 y finalizo el registro de territorio 5 anos antes de que Japon fabricara el "anuncio del departamento de Shimane" No. 40.
					
					El subjefe de catedra de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Dr. y subprofesor titular, Ri Kwang Hui, se refirio a que Japon ha tratado historicamente de usurpar las islas Ullung y Tok.
					
					Esas pretensiones continuaron desde la segunda mitad del siglo 14 hasta la ocupacion de todo el territorio coreano.
					
					En la Guerra Patriotica Imjin, los invasores japoneses irrumpieron en la isla Ullung convirtiendolo en ruinas y en el siglo 17, saquearon muchos recursos forestales y pesqueros en ambas islas.
					
					Japon reconocia oficialmente la soberania de la dinastia feudal de Joson sobre Ulung y Tok pero urdia por otra parte nuevos complots para arrebatarlos.
					
					En diciembre de 1869, inmediatamente despues de la "Renovacion de Meiji", llegaron a Corea los funcionarios japoneses de alto rango del MINREX con la mision de averiguar el proceso de incorporacion de Ullung y Tok a Corea.
					
					Despues de la sublevacion militar de Im-o de 1882, Hanabusa fue enviado a Corea como delegado plenipotenciario con la orden secreta de obtener de la dinastia feudal de Joson la concesion de la isla Ullung.
					
					El Dr. y subprofesor titular Han Yong Chan, vicerrector de la Universidad Pedagogica Kim Chol Ju dijo que el "derecho de posesion del islote Tok" planteado por Japon es una tergiversacion de historia que comenzo desde el "anuncio del departamento de Shimane" y continuo:
					
					El "anuncio" es un documento ilegal, invalido y fraudulento.
					
					Por eso, los convenios internacionales sobre la gestion del territorio japones, firmados despues del fin de la segunda guerra mundial, estipularon que Japon debe renunciar el islote Tok y lo declararon como el coreano.
					
					La Declaracion del Cairo y la Declaracion de Potsdam definieron claramente que las zonas arrebatadas por Japon con violencia y codicia seran excluidas del territorio japones y este sera compuesto por las 4 islas principales y "otros islotes" permitidos por los paises aliados.
					
					El jefe de seccion de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, Hwang Myong Chol, Dr. y su profesor titular califico la insistencia japonesa de una manifestacion de la ambicion militarista de expandir su territorio, y prosiguio:
					
					El objetivo de Japon detras de su insistencia esta en apoderarse de los abundantes recursos de la zona maritima del Tok a fin de monopolizar las concesiones economicas, por una parte, y por la otra, preparar la base avanzada y cabeza de puente que sirva para realizar la ambicion de expandir el territorio y  reagredir al continente asiatico.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses consideran a Corea como primer blanco de agresion a ultramar sonando con retomar la heguemonia de Asia.
					
					Los oradores exigieron a los reaccionarios japoneses que cancelen de inmediato su descarada "insistencia en la posesion del islote Tok" y el "Dia de Takeshima (islote Tok)" y actuen con prudencia abandonando su anacronica ambicion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica el servilismo proyanqui de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica el servilismo proyanqui de los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 18 de febrero (ACNC) -- En las recientes conversaciones con el secretario de Estado norteamericano, el ministro surcoreano de Relaciones Exteriores, Yun Pyong Se, consintio la opinion de su amo gringo sobre la supuesta "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea" diciendo que el disuasivo nuclear del Norte es el "principal factor de inestabilidad" e insistiendo nuevamente en el "proceso de desnuclearizacion". Ese dia, ambos acordaron intensificar la cooperacion en hacer frente al "problema nuclear del Norte de Corea".
					Es muy ridiculo que ocupara la jefatura de la diplomacia surcoreana ese idiota quien no sabe cual es el "factor de inestabilidad" de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ironiza asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado en su edicion de este miercoles y continua:
					
					El factor que inestabiliza la situacion y agrava la tension en la Peninsula Coreana es los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					El imperio trazo el guion de guerra anti-RPDC basado en el "uso inmediato de bombas nucleares" y desarrolla cada ano en suelo surcoreano los ejercicios belicos conjuntos aumentando sistematicamente el grado de amenaza y chantaje nucleares anti-RPDC. 
					
					Debido a tales maniobras, la nacion coreana vive siempre en la situacion inestable y se perturban la estabilidad y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Sin embargo, el traidor Yun cuestiona el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la parte connacional sin hacer referencia alguna a la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. 
					
					La realidad evidencia que los titeres surcoreanos no tienen ningun interes en el dialogo Norte-Sur ni en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas sino persiguen solo la ambicion de atacar a la parte connacional con la ayuda de las fuerzas extranjeras.
